title: 天空果园mod的自定义
author: VDASO
txt_content:
天空果园的配置文件怎么写？curseforge上的看着有点迷，希望有人能解释一下或者写一个例子？
mod链接：https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/sky-orchards?gameCategorySlug=mc-mods&projectID=308807

replies.author: CheatDiamond
replies.txt_content:
To add your own custom trees there are a few things you can adjust, for example; a new tree called 'Cottonwood' could be added like this:     cottonwood,minecraft:string#1#0#4,255,245,255     The syntax is as follows:     name, modName:itemName#amount#metaData#dropChance, r, g, b     name is what you call the tree (cottonwood in the example).     modName:itemName is the item you wish leaves to drop (Minecraft String in the example).  amount is the amount of items you would like to drop (1 in the example).  metaData is the meta data/damage value of the item to drop (0 in the example).  dropChance is a value of 1:(number) that the item will drop (4 in the example).     (you can add the words null or unused if you don't want a drop).     r, g, b stands for 3 numbers between 0 and 255 for an RGB colour for the tree.  (255,245,255 in the example) - google an RGB colour picker for easy colour selection.
中文版（来自万恶的机翻）：
例如，要添加自己的自定义树，可以调整一些内容。可以像这样添加一棵名为“ Cottonwood”的新树：     三角叶杨，minecraft：字符串＃1＃0＃4,255,245,255     语法如下：     名称，modName：itemName＃amount＃metaData＃dropChance，r，g，b     名称就是您所称的树（本例中为紫檀木）。     modName：itemName是您希望删除的项目（示例中为Minecraft String）。  amount是您要删除的项目数量（示例中为1）。  metaData是要删除的项目的元数据/损坏值（在示例中为0）。  dropChance是项目将要丢弃的值1：（number）（在示例中为4）。     （如果您不想删除，可以添加单词null或未使用）。     r，g，b代表树的RGB颜色在0到255之间的3个数字。  （在示例中为255,245,255）-用google RGB颜色选择器轻松选择颜色。
就是按照格式添加一种树，然后会带上果子、琥珀、琥珀块
其他的功能都要用crafttweaker来实现（匠魂什么的）

replies.author: VDASO
replies.txt_content:
